overview: Brainy Baby is university studied and published in JOCAM Journal of Children and Media. Peek a Boo introduces important concepts such as Object Permanence, Communication, Cause and Effect, Language Basics and many others. Eye catching visuals, rhymes, Music and lots of Peek a Boo Games.  Interactive Infant Early Learning DVD features Live Action and real children while using familiar objects to help make fast learning connections.
tagline: Brainy Baby Peek a Boo: Inspiring Creative Exploration Infant Brain Development
title: Brainy Baby: Peek-a-Boo
